attributes.action: let kids do it in there houses and let them concentrate on the lesson there want
attributes.background: A day in a life of a school kid is wake up go to school come home do homework go to sleep and you wonder why kids are getting obesit because they no time to exercise plus you could save 39 billion pond's each year

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Parents are already able to educate their children at home in certain circumstances. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/home-education

We're therefore not sure exactly what further action you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
